title: Disconnecting
body: So has anyone been disconnecting while on the client randomly in the past few days? because it just happened in my 5 man when we found a match and made us not accept.

replies.body: I haven't seen any widespread NA servers issues over the past day or so myself, so this might be more network or ISP related rather than a server issue. Let's adjust a few of those network settings really quickly to test if the problems are coming from some bad settings. Go through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying extra attention to the points on port forwarding and DNS, and let me know how that helps.
